skills.desc: Attacks 1 enemy. Places a 15% [Continuous Heal] buff on this Champion for 1 turn if the attack is critical.
skills.name: Chosen's Touch
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%

skills.desc: Teams up with 3 random allies to attack a single enemy. The allies joining the attack will use their default skills. Fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 30%. Increases the duration of all ally buffs by 1 turn.
skills.name: Companions of Fate

skills.desc: Places a 30% [Increase C. RATE] buff and a 50% [Increase ATK] buff on all allies for 2 turns. Has a 25% chance of granting an Extra Turn.
skills.name: Banner of Legend
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 3 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 4 Buff/Debuff Chance +5%
Lvl. 5 Buff/Debuff Chance +10%
